author: brane
msg: Extend the JavaHL remote status interface so that it provides info gleaned
from entry props for modified nodes.
RemoteStatus.modifiedSymlink): Add nodeInfo parameter to callback method.
(StatusEditor.make_entry): New; constructs an Entry from entry props.
Add optional output to stderr to debug status info.
(SVNRemoteTests.testPropchangeStatus): Check deleted flag and entry revision.

author: tbeerbower
msg: AMBARI-2553 - Delay between service tab opening and displaying actual states of Stop/Start buttons

author: mahadev
msg: AMBARI-2571. Remove epel repos in the local repo information for all the local repos so that Ambari does not install them. (mahadev)

author: mahadev
msg: AMBARI-2570. Ambari server with Oracle DB doesn't reset via ambari-server reset. (Myorslav via mahadev)

author: bikas
